previewArticle.title: Columbus Crew vs. Chivas USA | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Columbus Crew 3, Chivas USA 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Columbus Crew look to stir up the playoff race in the Eastern Conference against a struggling Chivas USA
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Columbus Crew vs. Chivas USA | September 7, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 10': Wonderful pass from Pipa to lead Finlay down the right side. Ethan tries to cross it in, but it's deflected out. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Brett Stewart
timelineItems.text: Paladini is flying around the pitch early in! #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: A point today would not get #Crew96 back in a playoff position. Need a full 3 to climb back above the thin red line.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Sleepy start to this one. Chivas aren't too threatening, but #Crew96 don't seem too interested in pushing the issue either.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Clark comes out and snags a ball right at the edge of the box from the feet of Reo-Coker. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 12': Nice aggressive play by Clark to come off his line to his left to claim a ball before Reo-Coker gets to it. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: Gregg Berhalter has talked about teams bunkering in against his side vs. teams that like to play. I'd expect #ChivasUSA to be the former.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: Berhalter has also mentioned his side has a tougher time against that type of opponent. Let's see if #Crew96 can break down the Goats today.

timelineItems.comment: Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marco Delgado (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Without Trapp/Tchani in the midfield, Higuain is trying to do a little too much. He's had the ball on his foot for much of this first 13'.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Paladini tries to psych out the wall, but it doesn't work. Higuain takes the kick, hits it into the wall, Chivas get possession. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Aaron Schoenfeld (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Schoenfeld gets another foul in the 16'. He is the only #Crew96 player with a foul so far.

timelineItems.name: Paul Garlock
timelineItems.text: There are a couple buzzards riding thermals over #Crew96 stadium. They are smelling cooked goat, no doubt. #MLS #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: John Rongyos
timelineItems.text: #LucaKnowsHeart #crew96

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: George and Paladini both over 90% passing thus far. Filling the Trapp/Tchani roles well. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Meram is fouled about 6 yards away from the corner flag. Interesting set piece opportunity for #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA much better attacking down the right side. Kaji getting forward very well.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA).
Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 1': #ChivasUSA wearing its rarely-seen blue shirt with white shorts. #Crew96 in all-gold.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).
Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 19': Meram wins a free kick from the left side and Higuain takes again. He searches for Wahl at the far post, but it's just high. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Columbus Crew 3, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @ColumbusCrew win with authority over @CDChivasUSA, 3-0. #CLBvCHV http://t.co/MvgqBnEIdM http://t.co/3GILMJtmlQ

timelineItems.desc: The Columbus Crew remain in the Eastern Conference playoff hunt with a 3-0 win over Chivas USA
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Columbus Crew vs. Chivas USA | September 7, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@ColumbusCrew moving into playoff position with win. #CLBvCHV Highlights: http://t.co/3P4PCjRwM3 http://t.co/wxryZIn0qw

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Nigel Reo-Coker (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Nigel Reo-Coker's chance tests Steve Clark early

timelineItems.name: Paul Garlock
timelineItems.text: Higuain not looking so hot so far. A number of missed passes and off-target service #Crew96 #MLS #ChivasUSA #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: By the way, you can listen to the audio for today's #Crew96 match for free on http://t.co/DffZCQIIoK: http://t.co/tfMZDmSfYD #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Nigel Reo-Coker (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Félix Borja.

timelineItems.name: farooqaloops
timelineItems.text: Nothing cures the buckeye football blues than the #columbuscrew #crew96 #gorgeousday #sundayfunday

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 22': #ChivasUSA gets forward with Reo-Coker having a go from just outside the area. It takes a small deflection, but Clark saves. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Jim Q. Public
timelineItems.text: Paladini is doing fine, but no substitute for Tchani's physical presence in the middle. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Chivas first shot of the game that actually requires a save, albeit an easy one as it was right at Clark. #Crew96 0-0 23'

timelineItems.comment: Aaron Schoenfeld (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Eriq Zavaleta (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Kaji takes a final-third throw in, and just plays a game of catch with Clark who jumps up to get the ball. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: I'm not keeping track, but I'd wager #Crew96's passing completion rate can't much higher than 65%. Passes have seemed a yard off or so.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: @Theretofore Nah. I can't see them scoring in this one. A 0-0 draw wouldn't necessarily surprise me though.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: Final pass just missing from the #Crew96 attack today. Missing the necessary energy and focus.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: It's a lazy Sunday approach thus far for #Crew96. Not that they're lazy, but this game just has that feel so far.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Justin Meram (Columbus Crew).
Akira Kaji (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Columbus Crew. Federico Higuaín tries a through ball, but Waylon Francis is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA doing well to not allow #Crew96 to play through the middle so far. It's forced play down the wings/Higuaín all over the place.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: Eric Gehrig is not a right back in Berhalter’s system. The Crew miss Hector Jimenez right now. #DanInEnglish #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: A lot of final-third throw ins in this game so far. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Isaac Oyer
timelineItems.text: Perfect Sunday afternoon to catch some #Crew96 soccer!

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Aaron Schoenfeld (Columbus Crew).
Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Any time the Crew crosses midfield, there are eight Chivas players defending the goal. This has been a bad situation for #crew96 this year.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 31’ #Crew96 might want to start pumping long balls forward. Current strategy isn’t paying off.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Happy you could join us! RT @ChristinaMT: Happy 24th Birthday to the Muryn Twins! Celebrating at @ColumbusCrew soccer game. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: InWoodbridge
timelineItems.text: It appears that a new owner could have success with #ChivasUSA. They have a hard working team and just need a carefully selected DP or two.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: I did not think this would be the LA team that #Crew96 had trouble scoring against.

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Marco Delgado (Chivas USA).
Attempt blocked. Dan Paladini (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Chivas now have a higher passing accuracy and better possession than #Crew96. #what

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: No, the internet is working fine in the #Crew96 press box. There's just little to talk about in this game.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Tony Lochhead.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: A cross is headed out by Chivas, so #Crew96 will get their second corner of the game. Set piece may be the only way they find the net.

timelineItems.desc: Aaron Schoenfeld creates the first real chance for the Columbus Crew.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Aaron Schoenfeld's quick cross nearly finds Finlay

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Waylon Francis (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Ethan Finlay.

timelineItems.name: Massive Report
timelineItems.text: 36' #Crew96 earn a corner after zipping the ball around a bit. Francis crosses it in to the back post and it is headed behind.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 attack has picked up in the last 5 minutes. Looks like they really want one before the half. 38' 0-0

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 37': CHANCE - Pipa finds a streaking Schoenfeld up the sideline. The #BigCelery's cross is just ahead of an open Finlay in front of net.

timelineItems.desc: Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Andrew Jean-Baptiste is first in the book for a rough challenge

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: If anything is going to happen offensively for #Crew96, they've got to get some decent service in from wide positions...particularly backs.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Hey Higuain, if the ref doesn't call a foul, the ball is actually still in play, and you shouldn't stop trying. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: That #Crew96 chance was a complete reversal of roles. Schoenfeld crossing to Finlay who found himself on the left side of the field.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 38’ Best chance of the game from #Crew96. Higuain to Schoenfeld, who passes across the face of goal, but too far for Finlay.

timelineItems.name: Casually Obsessed
timelineItems.text: Nordecke (Columbus Crew) 2-poles for son of LA Galaxy player who passed away. #crew96 #bemassive #mls http://t.co/0Kwdh6Qxt4

timelineItems.name: angie martaus
timelineItems.text: It is a PERFECT day for soccer. #crew96

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: A collision of Baptiste and Schoenfeld comes away with a #ChivasUSA free kick and Schoenfeld holding his mouth.

timelineItems.name: chivasusa
timelineItems.text:
#ChivasUSA Starting XI | Alineación: Kennedy; Kaji, Jean-Baptiste, Zavaleta, Lochhead; Delgado, Pelletieri, Reo-Coker, Avila; Borja, Finley

On bench | En la banca: Spangenberg, Sturgis, Hurtado, Chavez, Barrera, Bolaños, Toia

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA).
Aaron Schoenfeld (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Jean-Baptiste picks up a yellow in the 40' for a foul on Schoenfeld. Easy call for the ref. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Justin Meram.
Dan Kennedy (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dan Paladini (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 40': CAUTION - Chivas USA's Jean-Baptiste is booked for taking down Schoenfeld. Still 0-0. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: And just as I say that, Schoenfeld lays a good cross in for Finlay... but it's just a bit too far in front of him. Best look for #Crew96 yet

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Weird sequence. Looked like Schoenfeld had a goal, but Paladini is ruled offside in the buildup. #Crew96 looking dangerous for once.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Crowd thinks its a goal as Schoenfeld puts it in the back of the net, but is offsides. No goal. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Adding confusion to the play was the fact that Paladini ran into the goalie, which is what gave Schoenfeld the open net. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 41': #Crew96 GOAL DISALLOWED - Schoenfeld's goal is called off as Paladini collides with Kennedy inside the six yard box.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 41’ Offside call on Schoenfeld takes away what was the first goal of the match. Crew pressing though. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 showing signs here. They seem to need time to wake up this year, when they wake up.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Paladini was actually the one offside, not Schoenfeld. #Crew96 It was the right call, much to the crowd's dismay.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 41’ #Crew96 pone el balón en contra de las redes pero una falta previa de Paladini a Kennedy mantiene el partido a ceros

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Higuain has tried a lot of his little tricks and flicks tonight, and not many have come off. Seems like he's feeling the frustration.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Kaji heads a cross out, so another corner for #Crew96 before the half ends. Don't expect much stoppage time.

timelineItems.desc: Penalty conceded by Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) after a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Ryan Finley concedes a penalty just before the half

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Andrew Jean-Baptiste.
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Akira Kaji.
Penalty conceded by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Columbus Crew. Aaron Schoenfeld draws a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: PK is called! #Crew96

timelineItems.desc: Penalty missed! Still  Columbus Crew 0, Chivas USA 0. Federico Higuain (Columbus Crew) hits the bar with a right footed shot.
timelineItems.title: PK MISS: Federico Higuain hits the cross bar

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Penalty to #Crew96!

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Schoenfeld was the one that drew the PK. #Crew96 44'

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 45' Penalty kick called in favor of #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 45’ #PENAL! #PENALTY to the #Crew96. Schoenfeld pulled down in box on corner kick.

timelineItems.name: Kirsten Heimlich
timelineItems.text: Not sure who that was a plenty but to be fair Crew had a good goal taken away a few minutes ago #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: A bit of a makeup call from the referee? #Crew96 #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.comment: Penalty missed! Still  Columbus Crew 0, Chivas USA 0. Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) hits the bar with a right footed shot.
Dan Kennedy (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 45': PENALTY SAVED - Pipa aims high and Kennedy sends it into the crossbar. Still 0-0. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Buuuut... Higuaín puts his spot kick off the bar. And it's going to be that type of day. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: MISS! Higuain SLAMS the PK right off the crossbar, then commits foul on Kennedy. Still 0-0. Wasted opportunity. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Higuain's PK hits the crossbar, he runs up to try and play the rebound, and he runs into the keeper, gets called for a foul. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: CORRECTION - Higuaín's penalty was directly into the woodwork. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: That was just poor all around from Higuain - especially the shoulder into the chest of Kennedy. #crew96

timelineItems.name: John Bava III
timelineItems.text: Could it be one of those days? Higuain misses a penalty at the end of the 1st half. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Columbus Crew 0, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: It was a questionable PK to begin with, but #Crew96 need to capitalize on that. I suppose the best thing to say is ball don't lie.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: I'm beginning to think Pipa just doesn't like taking PKs on that half. Has missed two this year down there. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: Halftime | Medio tiempo: #ChivasUSA 0-0 #Crew96 @ Crew Stadium #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: Evan Shannon
timelineItems.text:
Good try #crew96 
You at least hit the crossbar 
#pk

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: HALFTIME: #Crew96 0 - @cdchivasusa 0. Black & Gold head into halftime tied at 0 with the Goats.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: HT #Crew96 0 #ChivasUSA 0. Though they dominated possession, the Crew struggled to break down Chivas' 9-man defense.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: PENALTY SAVE - Federico Higuain slams the ball against the crossbar after Aaron Schoenfeld was taken down in the box. #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: HT #Crew96 0 #ChivasUSA 0. Though they dominated possession, the Crew struggled to break down the 9-10 men Chivas always had behind the ball

timelineItems.name: Drew  Rauschenberger
timelineItems.text: #crew96 #columbustillidie

timelineItems.name: Darbs
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 need more energy and passion. Playing down to the competition.

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Go home, TV. You're drunk. RT @TWCSportsOH: Halftime Score: @Columbuscrew & @cdchivasusa tied at 9 #mlssoccer #crew96

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 doing their usual thing in terms of possession (54%) and passing (completing 83%) but the offense has struggled to get going.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Something else to consider: should Higuaín be taking #Crew96 penalties any longer? His conversion rate from the spot has been iffy at best.

timelineItems.name: TWC SportsChannel OH
timelineItems.text: That should be 0 RT @TWCSportsOH Halftime Score: @Columbuscrew & @cdchivasusa tied at 0 #mlssoccer #crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Pipa leads the way. #Crew96 http://t.co/BcwOTszjL5

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Columbus Crew 0, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: We're back for the second half of the match! Let's go #ChivasUSA! #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Second half starts a lot like the first half ended- corner kick for the crew. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Andrew Jean-Baptiste.
Attempt missed. Tyson Wahl (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left following a corner.
Attempt saved. Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 47': Good opening to the second half for #Crew96, a few dangerous Finlay runs and a corner that's eventually recovered by #ChivasUSA.

timelineItems.name: Trevor Edmonds
timelineItems.text: Lets go columbus! #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Tony Lochhead.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 49': Another corner for #Crew96 takes a dangerous hop entirely through the area. Nervy moment averted for #ChivasUSA.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Félix Borja (Chivas USA).
Eric Gehrig (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Chivas USA. Ryan Finley tries a through ball, but Félix Borja is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 49’ Higuain with a near post corner and the ball goes through the area, no one gets on the end of it. Great chance. #Crew96

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Columbus Crew 1, Chivas USA 0. Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Justin Meram gives the Crew the lead with a beautifully placed strike

timelineItems.comment: Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Justin Meram (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: Eric Gehrig was #Crew96's leader in touches in the first half. Building down the right.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 52': GOAL #CREW96!

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: MERAM! #CREW96

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: 52' Justin Meram from his patented spot, and it's a 1-0 lead for the #crew96. Meram had space, stepped up and got it off.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Textbook Meram. Buries the bending shot in the 52', 1-0 #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 52’ GOAL MERAM! Meram cuts in from the left and puts a textbook curler past Dan Kennedy. That’s a layup for him. 1-0 #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 52' Shot from the top of the box by Meram, goal for #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: Justin Meram. Wow. A seeing-eye shot par excellence. #crew96

timelineItems.name: Kailen Nourse
timelineItems.text: Finally! #Crew96 goal! http://t.co/mbpQQTFmTd

timelineItems.name: Christopher Wilson
timelineItems.text: And then that happened ... #crew96 #614 #asseenincolumbus #morelikesthanmarykate

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 52': Justin Meram gets the ball just outside the box, cutting inside to his right. A patented curler ensues. 1-0 thanks to J9. #Crew96

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Aaron Schoenfeld (Columbus Crew) header from the center of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy with a fine save on Schoenfeld

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: If you didn't see that coming when Meram got that ball with room, you haven't been watching #Crew96 soccer.

timelineItems.name: Nino Torres
timelineItems.text: Bend it like Meram! #Crew96 1-0 #CLBvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 53': SUB - Wilmer Cabrera responds with the match's first substitution. Marvin Chavez replaces former #Crew96 man Ryan Finley.

timelineItems.name: Finolee Sinn
timelineItems.text: Bengals win at the same time that Justin Meram scores a goal. perfect sequence of events! #WhoDey #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Lauren Pioli
timelineItems.text: CREW GOOOOOALLL!!!! #Crew96 @JustinMeram http://t.co/XmMKOQLQDb

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Aaron Schoenfeld (Columbus Crew) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ethan Finlay with a cross.
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 54': CHANCE - #Crew96 starting to feel it. Schoenfeld heads on-goal and Dan Kennedy has to make a wonderful diving save.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Aaron Schoenfeld just had maybe the best #Crew96 header all season, but Kennedy got down to save it somehow. Things clicking for the Crew.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Corner somehow skips through a flood of Crew players, goes out for a Chivas throw in. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Justin Meram with the break through for @ColumbusCrew. #CLBvCHV http://t.co/Hm8FJmAlwK

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Federico Higuain (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy with another crucial stop on Higuain

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: And Schoenfeld nearly doubles #Crew96's lead with a superb headed effort... but Kennedy comes up with a nice save.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 54’ BIG SAVE Kennedy on a great flicked header from Schoenfeld. Game is on the verge of opening up. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: Once you break down a bunkering team once, you can usually open them up. #Crew96 look apt to bag a few more today.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Eric Gehrig.
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 56': Great passing combination from Finlay to Gehrig to Higuain leads to a shot from outside the box for Pipa. Kennedy saves again. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: 56' Dan Kennedy comes up pumping his fists after denying Higuain on a Crew fast break. #crew96

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Now Kennedy denies Higuaín with another nice save. His #ChivasUSA teammates should buy that guy a cerveza or two tonight. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Chavez with a decent look, but sends it wide. #Crew96 still up 1-0 58'

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) left footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: The green breaks slightly to the right as J9 makes it 1-0. #Crew96 http://t.co/WBCOferpzE

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Columbus Crew 2, Chivas USA 0. Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Justin Meram earns a second half brace with a great strike

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 58’ Chavez WIDE. Best chance of the game for Chivas USA from the substitute. Curls it just wide. #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Um, Justin Meram scored again. 2-0 #crew96 in the 59th minute.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Guldan
timelineItems.text: The Chivas midfield isn't good enough to push forward and carry the game. #Crew96 have them in a perfect spot.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: "Take Meram out!" I said. Because I am smart. #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: Massive Report
timelineItems.text: PATTEN THAT SHOT MERAM! 2-0 #CREW96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 59': Meram picks off a pass, walks in one-on-one, takes another touch to his right and curls it in AGAIN! Nearly identical finish! #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Somebody ate their chicken and pasta tonight. @JustinMeram is going nuts now. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 59': GOAL #CREW96! Mirror image for J9!

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 6': Higuain tries a cross-field through pass but it's too far ahead of Finlay. #Crew96 controlling play thus far (65.5% possession).

timelineItems.name: John Bava III
timelineItems.text: Must win for #Crew96 vs Chivas at home today; currently 7th in East; a win would put them in 4th.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: that's seven on the season for Meram, closing in on team leader Higuain who has nine. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: Meram's right foot is Arjen Robben's left foot. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Meran x 2. @ColumbusCrew rolling. #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Nigel Reo-Coker (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Dan Paladini (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA has scored two or more goals only four times this season. Sigh of relief, #crew96 fans.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Justin Meram.
Marco Delgado (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Waylon Francis (Columbus Crew).
Offside, Chivas USA. Andrew Jean-Baptiste tries a through ball, but Félix Borja is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Classic Meram today though... completely invisible in the first half, then he pops up out of nowhere and is incredibly influential. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: The Galaxy/Dynamo games showed what happens when #Crew96 can play both halves with the same intensity. The difference between good and great

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 66': First change for #Crew96 as Gregg Berhalter brings Bernardo Anor on to replace today's two-time goal scorer, Justin Meram.

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: This is the first multi-goal game of Justin Meram's career, and he is subbed out in the 66th minute for Bernardo Anor. #crew96

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Perfect placement by Justin Meram for his first strike of the afternoon. #CLBvCHV #Crew96 Watch: http://t.co/bHXXmp2lYZ

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: It's all in the hips, J9. #Crew96 http://t.co/amOZBLYxpw

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Félix Borja (Chivas USA) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Akira Kaji.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: After that slow start, #Crew96 have worked their way up to 11 shots vs. Chivas 2. #sunsoutgunsout

timelineItems.desc: Eric Gehrig (Columbus Crew) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Eric Gehrig is shown yellow for a late foul

timelineItems.comment: Luis Bolaños (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Eric Gehrig (Columbus Crew).
Attempt missed. Eric Gehrig (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Bernardo Anor.
Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).
Kevan George (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Stuart Coulson
timelineItems.text: Beautiful day for the beautiful game #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Andrew Jean-Baptiste.
Félix Borja (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kevan George (Columbus Crew).
Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: So much space between Chivas USA defensive line and midfield line. Can’t understand why Pelletieri/Reo Coker don’t sit back. #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.comment: Bernardo Anor (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Félix Borja (Chivas USA).
Attempt blocked. Dan Paladini (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Federico Higuaín.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: A comforting thought: #ChivasUSA haven't looked like they're interested in attacking at all today, so a comeback seems unlikely. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: WATCH - Vintage @JustinMeram makes it 1-0: http://t.co/IORj0b1qVK #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Hector Jimenez will be checking in for #crew96.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Schoenfeld still in the game well past the point where Bedell usually gets subbed out. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: Three guesses when the #crew96 broke this game wide open... via Squawka http://t.co/IahEUGMgYY

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Good to see @BernardoAnor back out there. He's been patient with his nagging hamstring long enough.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Scoreboard has gone dark in #Crew96 stadium. but no fire. so they have that going for them.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: The new HD scoreboard has gone black at Crew Stadium. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Jared Koon
timelineItems.text: Great game so far Crew. 2 to nothing. #crew96

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: If give @JustinMeram a goal he's gonna want another. Watch his second for @ColumbusCrew: http://t.co/SCXdEtttuY #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: CrewSupportersUnion
timelineItems.text: Hope we kept the receipt for the scoreboard, it's currently out. #Crew96 http://t.co/oByWK6ilYS

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 75' #ChivasUSA 0-2 #Crew96 @ Crew Stadium #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Subs: #Crew96 Hector Jimenez in, Finlay out.

timelineItems.name: Christopher Kent
timelineItems.text: Enjoying a 2-0 lead by @ColumbusCrew #Crew96 http://t.co/KKXEjQlVJC

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 77': SUB - Jairo Arrieta on, Aaron Schoenfeld off for #Crew96. That's the final change of the match for either side.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: And finally, Schoenfeld out, Arrieta in. #Crew96 and Chivas all done with subs now, 77' 2-0

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 76': SUBS - Hector Jimenez on, Ethan Finlay off for #Crew96 and Donny Toia on, Agustin Pelletieri off for #ChivasUSA.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dan Paladini (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Federico Higuaín.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Correction: Nathan Sturgis on for Chivas USA, not Donny Toia. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: WATCH - @JustinMeram scores his second of the afternoon: http://t.co/0WVDNEQYpQ #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Alex Adkins
timelineItems.text: GO CREW!! GOAL 3!!! #Crew96

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Columbus Crew 3, Chivas USA 0. Bernardo Anor (Columbus Crew) header from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bernardo Anor Heads home to give the Crew a three-goal lead

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Corner kick coming up for #Crew96. 8' 0-0

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 8': First corner kick of the match as Higuain hits an in-swinger. Kennedy comes out well to claim it, however. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 8' First corner kick of the game for #Crew96. Ball goes straight into the hands of Kennedy

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Bernardo Anor heads a Hector Jimenez cross past Dan Kennedy for a 3-0 #crew96 lead.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 80': GOAL #CREW96! It's three!

timelineItems.name: Patrick Guldan
timelineItems.text: A win would put the #Crew96 back in 4th place, edging out Philly on goal differential.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 80’ GOAL CREW! Bernardo Anor with a Powerful wide-open header, Dan Kennedy makes save but falls into net. 3-0 Crew. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: There's a nice welcome back for @BernardoAnor. He is an absolute monster in the air. @@HectorJimenez09 with a perfect ball in to him.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 80': Tremendous passing play by the Black & Gold. Gehrig to Jimenez to Anor, who heads it in just over the line. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Jimenez and Gehrig both picked up assists on the goal. #Crew96 subs doing work.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: Hector Jimenez played a perfect ball to the far post and earns an assist. Gehrig with an assist as well. Icing on the #cake. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 80' Goal for #Crew96 by Anor via header | Gol para Columbus en un cabezazo de Anor

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: After being out since early July, it's nice to see Añor cap his comeback match with a well headed goal. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Crewzing now. Bernardo Anor makes it three for @ColumbusCrew. #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Who is the Chivas keeper, and what has he done with Dan Kennedy? #howler #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: Elizabeth Coy
timelineItems.text: The massive sunburn I will have tomorrow is totally worth it since #Crew96 are up 3-nil against Chivas. #bemassive

timelineItems.name: Peter Jon Showalter
timelineItems.text: #crew96

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: None of the #CLBvCHV 3rd-goal tweets mentioning that Kennedy appeared to forget where his line was. Anor will take the accolades, though.

timelineItems.name: Massive Report
timelineItems.text: 86' Francis sends a low cross in and it is deflected behind for another #Crew96 corner.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Kennedy came flying out to punch the ball away, no real threat from #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Andrew Jean-Baptiste.
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Kennedy with a finger tip save on a fantastic turn and shoot play from Jimenez. tenth corner coming up. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 87': CHANCE - Arrieta nearly makes it four, but Kennedy is there to make the stop for the Goats. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Despite letting in 3 goals, Kennedy has made some nice saves today. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Courtney Kemper
timelineItems.text: Even though my eyes are closed...we saw Frankie #Crew96 #columbuscrew http://t.co/g4E2cE62hL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jairo Arrieta (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Héctor Jiménez.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 86': Pipa looks for Anor on the #Crew96 corner, but Kennedy darts out to punch it away.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Heckathorn
timelineItems.text: Goal no. 4 for the Crew #relentless it's 4-0 Columbus over Chivas USA #Crew96

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Arrieta creates a chance, but Kennedy makes another top notch save. #ChivasUSA could easily be down 6-0 if not for his heroics. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Patrick Guldan
timelineItems.text: With the 17,043 attendance number today, the season average for the #Crew96 is 16,318. Consistently strong.

timelineItems.name: Scott Gill-Jacobson
timelineItems.text: The #Crew96 look decent against an uninspired Chivas. I'm cautiously optimistic about the playoffs, but there is still something missing.

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Nice of @ESPN to hold off the #PORvSJ kickoff so we can finish watching #CLBvCHV. #sarcasm

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: I feel badly for Anor - it isn't often that you score a goal and yet still fall farther down the depth chart in your position #crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Nothin doin on that Crew Corner. Kennedy played it well. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: John Bava III
timelineItems.text: Berhalter decides to start Shoenfeld up front today; Bedell hasn't been impressive the last few games. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: We feel the love. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: How does this game turn out if Reo-Coker's shot in the first half had gone in? #crew96 #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 90': Two minutes of added time per the fourth official.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: So J9 scores two goals, and the #Crew96 record will move to 9-9-9. NINES ALL AROUND!

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Columbus Crew 3, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Final: #Crew96 3, #ChivasUSA 0. Crew 9-9-9 on season now, up to 4th place in East. Crew now 5-2-1 in last eight games.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: FINAL -- #Crew96 3, @cdchivasusa 0. Three points for the Black & Gold on this Sunday afternoon!

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 4 - @ColumbusCrew have lost just one of their last seven #MLS meetings with Chivas USA, winning four of these (2D). Chance. #CLBvCHV

timelineItems.name: Jeffrey™
timelineItems.text: Thanks for the tickets @ColumbusCrew beautiful day for a game! #Crew96 http://t.co/LJ4mY1ktdS

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Bros on the #USMNT backline for the better half of a decade. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 and @cdchivasusa are wearing black armbands today to honor Luca DeLaGarza, son of @LAGalaxy defender @AJD_20. #LucaKnowsHeart

timelineItems.name: Brandon Curran
timelineItems.text: Another weekend, another Columbus Crew game with @WittySwitty72 #Crew96 http://t.co/70Vdrya2ik

timelineItems.name: Ray
timelineItems.text: Absolutely delightful day for a #Crew96 match. It's another final. Let's make it a win, cool? http://t.co/PpumU3W9Wq

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGH FIVE! Great success! #CLBvCHV getting underway on @Unimas. http://t.co/JzZE5bIqK1 http://t.co/883Vhc6ULX

timelineItems.name: Nino Torres
timelineItems.text: Perú presente en el Estadio del Columbus Crew #Crew96 #Peru #HispanicHeritageMonth http://t.co/CbSMx2EpsV

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Line 'em up. #Crew96 http://t.co/bBYnpbrA14

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Moment of silence here at #Crew96 Stadium before kickoff to honor Luca DeLaGarza, son of @LAGalaxy defender @AJD_20. #LucaKnowsHeart

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Interested to see what Aaron Schoenfeld can do up top. Hasn't played more than 30 minutes in a game this season. #crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Gorgeous day here at #Crew96 Stadium. Teams are taking the field now. Black & Gold shooting toward the south goal in the first half.

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
